phrases: Not because of you or anything.
What does it have to do with you?
Let us get along then, kouhai.
She is a first year, right?
She is a friend of Kirino and mine.
Wait, what is her real name?
That would be my human name.
I called you Kuroneko all this time...
With Miss Kiririn away, you must be so lonely, so I was invited to check in on you.
Truth is, I am feeling more refreshed than ever with that noisy sister gone.
And you are accepting it without a second thought.
This is the present you got that one time...
Has not Kirino called you guys or anything?
She put up a short update on her SNS blog, but that is all.
I was just getting fed up with that woman, too.
It is so refreshing to have her gone.
To be perfectly honest, I am kind of angry with her.
I consider her a close friend, and I believed she thought of me the same way...
And yet, taking off like that without consulting any of us...
It is really painful, sad, and hard to bear.
I admire that she is following her ambitions like this, but I still cannot agree with how she went about it.
And on top of that, she has not called or emailed us,
and I have not seen her online at all, either...
It is all slowly getting to me.
Do not you think it is okay for me to be just a little mad?
How about the three of us go out somewhere then?
And after that, you can post about it.
It will definitely piss her off.
Why are you running off home?
I sent you a mail, did not I?
I said I would come to your classroom after homeroom's over.
I wanted to introduce you two.
Kyou-chan, you call her Kuroneko-san, right?
Would you mind if I did too?
Maschera's airing today so I have to get back.
Maschera ended at episode 12 in the second season.
Do not talk like it is over!
I just meant to say that the next season has not been scheduled yet!
None of the real fans have given up on it.
We are going to karaoke, so if you wa
We were just asking her out ourselves...
Speaking of which, have you picked a club yet?
I have enough on my plate already.
I did not know we had a club like this...
Please give it a try if you would like.
This looks like a danmaku shooter...
Our club president made it with the idea that it would be some sort of entry test.
There is an easy mode, so give it a go.
Piece of cake for you, right?
That mode is seriously hard, you know...
You beat the high score too!
It was a thoroughly terrible game from beginning to end.
Please tell the creator to go die.
YOU-Um... will not you join our club?
It has nothing to do with you.
I just do not have time to go out with them.
You say that, but you have been spending a lot of time here lately.
I believe what Miss Kuroneko wants to say is,
I would rather be with you than go out with my classmates!
Do not interpret things so weirdly!
I did not say a thing!!
Anyway, you cannot go on like this.
You do not have any friends, right?
What Mr. Kyousuke is thinking is,
I will show my cute kouhai how cool I can be!
And then she will pay me back with sexual favors!
What kind of translation is that?!
Wh-What are you planning to do to me??
Do not hide behind my sheets!
Well, not all of it is untrue.
I like it when you call me senpai,
and I was thinking maybe if I help you out somehow, we could get to know each other better...
So I will not say I had zero ulterior motives,
but I really do want to help you solve your problems.
And that is not a lie!
In that case, how about joining a club?
I am Makabe, a second year.
and this is Gokou, first year.
Let me introduce you to our club president.
Kousaka-san and Gokou-san have come to visit.
So you put my little Fana-tan model to good use?
I guess it was worth it then.
I have kept it safe in my garage.
I will go pick it up later then.
I did not get your name or address at the time,
so I searched around Akiba afterwards, but..
That night was so full of passion for us, it was not the time or place for it!
Anyway, I am great buddies with this guy.
I am sure you have noticed, so let me explain.
This guy's been held back who knows how many years now.
That is why he looks so old.
Do not just go telling people that!
Forget the embarrassment and just hurry up and graduate!
We make games, but not everyone participates.
We have a lot of inactive members, and the only ones who come regularly are me and these guys.
We are holding a welcoming party soon, so I will introduce everyone again then.
What kind of games do you make?
We should have anything you would need.
You are interested in making games?
Well, I am pretty much able to use any of the tools without instruction.
With her and Akagi-san, our new members this year are pretty high level.
Akagi Sena-san, a first year, like Gokou-san.
She actually had the highest score on that game before Gokou-san came along.
Even when she is here, it is like she is having a staring contest with the computers and books, so she does not really talk about games at all.
And we do not have any girls in the club, so I guess it is a bit awkward for her.
That is another reason why it would be great to have Gokou-san join us.
Well, I guess it is better than having absolutely no girls in the club...
How about giving it a try?
They have tools and software I do not, and it seems I have freedom to do what I want to an extent,
so I suppose it is a bit more convenient than doing everything at home.
How is the club going for Kuroneko-san?
She does not make any trouble when she drops by.
You in charge of cleaning today?
You are always so kind, Kyou-chan.
Are you trying to take pity on me?
You are not lying when you say you are worried about me.
but have you thought about where those feelings come from?
I thought I would refrain from telling you,
but the reason you are trying to help me is because your sister is not around for you to help anymore.
You are doing this because I am a girl, younger than you, and I look like I am having trouble.
Because I look like I would rely on you.
That is all there is to it.
I am not a replacement for your sister.
Do not insult me like that.
Miss Kuroneko may have turned down joining a club and her classmates' invitations for the same reason.
Basically, she is afraid of losing time spent with us.
She has many things to do after school, and because she valued her time with us so much,
she may have been shunned by her class.
If you put yourself in her shoes and think about it, it is not so unexpected that she would say that.
Do not worry, she will forgive you if you apologize properly.
Are you going to stop sticking your nose in her business now?
It looks like you are all here.
Then let us get this welcoming party started!
Let us make this year a blast as well!
We have got some good new members this year.
Well, you just do not look like you are having fun.
I do not really like this club.
They are all gross guys, and it is filthy.
They make such weird games all the time, it is ridiculous.
And bringing in all these adult games and figures is just absurd.
I wanted to learn how to program.
The president's game, putting aside the setting, was well-made.
And the equipment here is better than expected.
I thought there might be enough benefits despite all the problems.
I have heard this story somewhere before...
But my patience does have its limits.
There are only a few people in here that actually participate, and the room is plain filthy.
You look more like the kind to join the student council than the Game Research Club.
I do not want to be thought of as one of their kind.
But will not you get branded as an otaku by joining a club like this?
I am sure people will understand if I explain myself properly!
Recent anime have girls trying to hide their otaku hobbies, but those are all just exaggerations.
There is no condemnation like that in reality.
We live in an age where watching anime in theaters is perfectly normal.
But are not eroge and doujinshi too much for them?
It is always important to pay attention to the time, place, and occasion, and the situation.
Otaku are not avoided because of their hobbies themselves.
They are avoided when they do something socially unacceptable.
Like the ones who spew lines and catchphrases anywhere and everywhere.
Sounds like some runt that can only live by leeching off others is trying to talk.
You leave such a weak impression, I did not notice you.
The most annoying woman in the class.
The biggest problem child in the class.
You said you were interested in programming, but do not you like games?
I like them as much as anyone else...
If you did not, you would not be so good at them.
It just kind of sounded like an act.
It is not something I need to hide, but I want to be a game designer in the future.
So that is why you want to learn how to program.
I guess that is how it is.
So you like games that much?
Yes, I like them a lot.
That you would have such tastes...
I am telling you, I am not!
I have only heard about it, but I hear Maschera's getting pretty popular lately.
What might you be talking about?
I am afraid I do not understand...
You were shrieking in joy those nights fantasizing about that Shin x Luci coupling.
That cute seme x tsundere uke of Luci x Shin is the essence of Maschera!
That is the one coupling that can never be reversed.
It would seem I have made you trip.
If you are so rotten, then I am sure you can even fantasize about half-real things like the Prince of Tennis musical?
So long as they brush against my heartstrings, I can save them in my mind and fantasize.
As an extreme example, I can take a fork and spoon and draw out some form of love.
But do you even fantasize about real men?
Last night, I had a dream where Makabe-senpai was gang raped by the other club members!
To think that she held such evil within her...
You have reeled in an absolutely terrifying pervert into our club!!
I am sorry I fantasized about you and the president going out!
But I could not hear your polite tsukkomi as anything but being tsundere!
Do not because him any deeper trauma than you already have!
Tell her, Sena-chan, you are so cute!
Sena-chan, it is not your fault!
You are screwed in the head, too.
Fine, let me talk to her.
Sorry to show you such a scene.
I was lonely without my sister.
Even with the way she is, it is pretty lonely without her.
So, I am going to keep sticking my nose in your business.
There is No Way My Little Sister 0000 can be This Cute
There is No Way My Kouhai Can Be This Rotten
sonna yasashiku shinai de donna kao sureba ii no?
nakushita kagi ha mitsukaranai mama de
tameiki... surechigai ni iji hatte tsukarechau
hon no sukoshi chikaku kimi to no kyori ga
umaku tsukamenainda ato chotto na no ni
sugu ni ai ni ikitai kedo kotoba ha mitsukaranai shi
saigo no ichi pe-ji kurai kimi ni ha egao misetai
Do not be so nice to me, I just do not know how to react
With all these words piling up,
I cannot even see your face
I lost my key, now I cannot find it
Sigh, I will burn out if I keep acting like this whenever we fight
Just how far away I am, even though you are right there
Do not be so nice to me, see?
With all these lies piling up, I cannot even move
I want to see you now, but I do not know what to say
If this is the end for our story, I want you to see my smile
houkago chaimu ha anata shiru mahou de
tayorinai senaka mo itooshiku saseru no
uchigawa gara kacchari kagi kaketa kimochi ni
kidzuite hoshii dake bukiyou na ai
namida mata koboshi makura nurasu no
hajirau kashikosa ha jama na dake
mujaki na kokoro no mama yudanetai no
The last bell rings, and the magic of knowing you
Makes your unreliable self all more sweeter
From the inside a click-clack, locking away my feelings
I want you to see, a clumsy love
How much must I desire for them to reach?
These feelings, written on one thousand leaves
Tears, spilled again, wet my pillow
All it is is love, but then it is love
Knowing all this shame just gets in my way
I just want to blur with this innocent heart
You might hold me tight, or maybe
I Am too deeply in love, waiting in vain
A maidens life is but so short
There is No Way My Kouhai Can Be This Cute
